page.title: 16OUR FAMILY WEEKEND 1
page.content:
On Friday we had a barbecue for my brother. We had flashing lights. We had 30 people coming to the barbecue. On Saturday I went swimming with my friends called Marie, Michelle and Paul. We had swimming races. We stayed there for two hours. Then we returned home and Michelle and I went in for our only drawing competition. My mum judged it and I won. Then we went to the Queenborough carnival. We saw a band and lots of floats. The best float was where a man was in the bath. On Sunday night I went in my auntie's jacuzzi where the bath bubbles up.
Caroline.
